summary.span: 在树结构中显示分层数据，例如目录。

span.span: Displays hierarchical data, such as a table of contents, in a tree structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [节点Nodes](#nodes) - [静态数据Static Data](#static_data) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [动态节点填充Dynamic Node Population](#dynamic_node_population) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [滚动Scrolling](#scrolling) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控制用于在树结构中显示分层数据，例如目录或文件目录的表和支持以下功能：The control is used to display hierarchical data, such as a table of contents or file directory, in a tree structure and supports the following features: - 数据绑定，使要绑定到 XML 中，表格，或关系数据的控件节点。Data binding that allows the nodes of the control to be bound to XML, tabular, or relational data. - 站点通过与集成导航控件。Site navigation through integration with the control. - 节点可以显示为纯文本或超链接的文本。Node text that can be displayed as either plain text or hyperlinks. - 以编程方式访问对象模型，以便创建树、 填充节点、 等动态设置属性。Programmatic access to the object model to create trees, populate nodes, set properties, and so on dynamically. - 客户端节点 （在支持的浏览器） 的填充。Client-side node population (on supported browsers). - 能够显示每个节点旁的复选框。The ability to display a check box next to each node. - 通过主题、 用户定义的可自定义外观的图像和样式。Customizable appearance through themes, user-defined images, and styles. > [!NOTE] > 控件旨在在内部使用控制时，才设置为`true`。The control is designed to be used inside an control only when is set to `true`. 控制用于更新选定的区域，而不是使用回发中更新整个页面的页面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)并[部分页呈现概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 节点Nodes 控件由节点构成。The control is made up of nodes. 在树中每个条目都叫做一个节点，并且由对象。Each entry in the tree is called a node and is represented by a object. 节点类型定义，如下所示：Node types are defined as follows: - 包含其他节点的节点称为*父节点*。A node that contains other nodes is called a *parent node*. - 包含在另一个节点的节点都称为*子节点*。The node that is contained by another node is called a *child node*. - 没有任何子级的节点称为*叶节点*。A node that has no children is called a *leaf node*. - 不包含的任何其他节点，但所有其他节点的上级的节点是否*根节点*。The node that is not contained by any other node but is the ancestor to all the other nodes is the *root node*. 父级和子级，但根，父级，可以是节点和叶节点是互相排斥。A node can be both a parent and a child, but root, parent, and leaf nodes are mutually exclusive. 一个节点为根、 子或叶节点决定的节点的多个视觉和行为属性。Several visual and behavioral properties of nodes are determined by whether a node is a root, child, or leaf node. 虽然典型树结构只包含一个根节点，但让您可以将多个根节点添加到树状结构。Although a typical tree structure has only one root node, the control allows you to add multiple root nodes to your tree structure. 当你想要显示项列表而不会显示一个根节点，如下所示的产品类别列表时，这很有用。This is useful when you want to display item listings without displaying a single root node, as in a list of product categories. 每个节点都属性和一个属性。Each node has a property and a property. 值属性显示在，而属性用来存储有关该节点，例如传递到与节点关联的回发事件的数据的任何其他数据。The value of the property is displayed in the , while the property is used to store any additional data about the node, such as data that is passed to the postback event that is associated with the node. 节点可以是在两种模式之一中： 选择模式和导航模式。A node can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode. 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要将节点放入导航模式，设置到不是空字符串值的节点的属性 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the property for the node to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置属性的节点为空字符串 ("")。To put a node into selection mode, set the property for the node to an empty string (""). > [!NOTE] > 某些 Internet 浏览器具有一个限制，即会影响性能的控件。Some Internet browsers have a limitation that can affect the performance of the control. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 有发 2067年字符的 URL 字符限制。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 has a URL character limit of 2067 characters that it posts. 如果某个节点的 URL 中的字符数大于该数字，展开该节点将失败，并且不会引发异常。If the number of characters in a URL of a node is larger than that number, expanding that node will fail and no exception is thrown. ## 静态数据Static Data 最简单的数据模型的控件是静态的数据。The simplest data model of the control is static data. 若要显示静态数据使用声明性语法，请首先打开和关闭``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To display static data using declarative syntax, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来，创建嵌套的树结构``元素的开始和结束之间``标记。Next, create the tree structure by nesting `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags. 每个``元素表示的节点在树中，并将映射到对象。Each `` element represents a node in the tree and maps to a object. 通过设置的属性可设置每个节点的属性及其``元素。You can set the properties of each node by setting the attributes of its `` element. 若要创建子节点，嵌套其他``元素的开始和结束之间``的父节点的标记。To create child nodes, nest additional `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags of the parent node. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件还可以绑定到数据。The control can also be bound to data. 可以使用两种方法之一将绑定到适当的数据源类型的控件：You can use either of two methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 控件可以使用任何实现的数据源控件接口，如控件或控件。The control can use any data source control that implements the interface, such as an control or a control. 若要将绑定到数据源控件，设置的属性控制对数据源控件的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 这是要将绑定到数据的首选的方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 控件还可以绑定到对象或具有关系对象。The control can also be bound to an object or a object with relations. 若要将绑定到这些数据源之一，将设置的属性控制到数据源，然后调用方法。To bind to one of these data sources, set the property of the control to the data source, and then call the method. 当绑定到数据源，其中每个数据项都包含多个属性 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素） 节点显示返回的值`ToString`数据项，默认情况下的方法。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 对于 XML 元素，该节点显示显示在树的基础结构，但其他方面不是非常有用的元素名称。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以通过指定树节点绑定使用绑定到特定数据项属性节点集合。You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings using the collection. 集合包含`TreeNodeBinding`对象以定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。The collection contains `TreeNodeBinding` objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 可以指定用于绑定和数据的项属性，以在节点中显示的条件。You can specify the criteria for binding and the data item property to display in the node. 树节点绑定的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on tree node bindings, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 恶意用户可以创建一个回调请求并获取数据的节点页面开发人员不显示控件。A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the control that the page developer is not displaying. 因此，必须由数据源实现数据的安全性。Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source. 不要使用属性隐藏数据。Do not use the property to hide data. ## 动态节点填充Dynamic Node Population 有时，它并不可行以静态方式定义的树状结构，因为数据源返回过多数据或要显示的数据取决于在运行时获取的信息。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically define the tree structure because the data source returns too much data or because the data to display depends on information that you get at run time. 正因为如此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的属性设置为`true`，在运行时节点展开时，会填充该节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充节点，必须定义包含用于填充的节点的逻辑的事件处理方法事件。To populate a node dynamically, you must define an event-handling method that contains the logic to populate a node for the event. 支持回调脚本的浏览器还可以利用客户端的节点填充。Browsers that support callback scripts can also take advantage of client-side node population. （这包括 Internet Explorer 5.5 和更高版本以及某些其他浏览器。）客户端的节点填充，控件来填充用户展开节点，而无需往返到服务器时使用客户端脚本的节点。(This includes Internet Explorer 5.5 and later and some other browsers.) Client-side node population enables the control to populate a node using client script when users expand the node, without requiring a round trip to the server. 客户端的节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 有许多方法可以自定义外观控件。There are many ways to customize the appearance of the control. 首先，您可以为每个节点类型指定不同的样式 （如字体大小和颜色）。First, you can specify a different style (such as font size and color) for each of the node types. 如果您使用级联样式表 (CSS) 自定义控件的外观，使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件，但不可同时使用两者。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of the control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能会导致意外的结果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. 使用与控件的样式表的详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件和 CSS 样式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42)。For more information on using style sheets with controls, see [Web Server Controls and CSS Styles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42). 下表列出了可用的节点样式。The following table lists the available node styles. |节点的样式属性Node style property|描述Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| ||在鼠标指针置于其上时的节点的样式设置。The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||叶节点的样式设置。The style settings for the leaf nodes.| ||节点的默认样式设置。The default style settings for a node.| ||父节点的样式设置。The style settings for the parent nodes.| ||根节点的样式设置。The style settings for the root node.| ||所选节点的样式设置。The style settings for a selected node.| 此外可以通过使用控制树中特定深度的节点的样式集合。You can also control the style of nodes at specific depths within the tree by using the collection. 集合中的第一个样式对应于在第一个级别在树中节点的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the first level in the tree. 集合中的第二个样式对应于树中，依次类推中第二个级别的节点的样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the second level in the tree, and so on. 这是最常用于生成表的内容 – 样式导航菜单其中某一深度的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子节点。This is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes. > [!NOTE] > 如果样式定义的某些深度级别使用集合，因此样式重写任何根、 父项或在该深度的节点的叶节点样式设置。If a style is defined for a certain depth level using the collection, that style overrides any root, parent, or leaf node style settings for the nodes at that depth. 若要更改控件外观的另一种方法是自定义中显示的图像的控件。Another way to alter the appearance of the control is to customize the images that are displayed in the control. 可以通过设置以下表中所示的属性来指定您自己自定义控件的不同部分的图像集。You can specify your own custom set of images for the different parts of the control by setting the properties shown in the following table. |映像属性Image property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||可折叠节点的指示符显示的图像 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the collapsible node indicator. 此映像通常是一个减号 （-）。This image is usually a minus sign (-).| ||用于可展开节点指示符显示的图像 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the expandable node indicator. 此映像通常是加号 （+）。This image is usually a plus sign (+).| ||包含用于连接到子节点的父节点的线条图像的文件夹 URL。The URL to the folder containing the line images used to connect parent nodes to child nodes. 属性也必须设置为`true`产生任何影响此属性。The property must also be set to `true` for this property to have an effect.| ||用于不可展开节点指示符显示的图像 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the non-expandable node indicator.| > [!NOTE] > 不需要自定义映像的每个属性。You do not need to customize every image property. 如果未显式设置 image 属性，则使用内置的默认图像。If an image property is not explicitly set, the built-in default image is used. 控件还可以显示的节点旁边的复选框。The control also allows you to display a check box next to a node. 当属性设置为值`TreeNodeTypes.None`，指定的节点类型旁边显示复选框。When the property is set to a value other than `TreeNodeTypes.None`, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node types. > [!NOTE] > 属性可以设置的按位组合为枚举成员值。The property can be set to a bitwise combination of the enumeration member values. 该页发送到服务器，每次集合会自动填充的所选的节点。Each time the page is posted to the server, the collection is automatically populated with the selected nodes. 在显示的复选框后，可以使用事件的复选框状态发生更改的各次发送到服务器时运行自定义的例程。When check boxes are displayed, you can use the event to run a custom routine whenever the state of a check box changes between posts to the server. ## 事件Events 控件提供了几个事件，可以对其进行编程。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这样，您可以运行自定义的例程，每当发生的事件。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了支持的事件控件。The following table lists the events that are supported by the control. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||发生时的复选框控件更改状态的各次发送到服务器。Occurs when the check boxes of the control change state between posts to the server.| ||在 控件中选定某个节点时发生。Occurs when a node is selected in the control.| ||在 控件中展开某个节点时发生。Occurs when a node is expanded in the control.| ||在 控件中折叠某个节点时发生。Occurs when a node is collapsed in the control.| ||当其 属性设置为 `true` 的节点在 控件中展开时发生。Occurs when a node with its property set to `true` is expanded in the control.| ||将数据项绑定到 控件中的某个节点时发生。Occurs when a data item is bound to a node in the control.| ## 滚动Scrolling 控件不具有内置的滚动。The control does not have built-in scrolling. 若要添加滚动，请将置于控制控件，并添加到滚动条控件。To add scrolling, place the control in a control and add scrollbars to the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[面板中 Web 服务器控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/127b61ed-87f2-46f4-92a3-785166e7245b)。For more information, see [Panel Web Server Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/127b61ed-87f2-46f4-92a3-785166e7245b). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，此控件呈现的标记可能符合辅助功能标准。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                 ``` ## Examples 本部分包含七个代码示例：This section contains seven code examples: - 第一个代码示例演示如何设置第二个代码示例的帧。The first code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the second code example. - 第二个代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法来显示中的静态数据控件。The second code example demonstrates how to use declarative syntax to display static data in the control. - 第三个代码示例演示如何将绑定到 XML 数据源的控件。The third code example demonstrates how to bind the control to an XML data source. - 第四个代码示例的第三个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The fourth code example provides sample XML data for the third code example. - 第五个代码示例演示如何使用通过将其绑定到的站点导航控件控件。The fifth code example demonstrates how to use the control for site navigation by binding it to a control. - 第六个代码示例提供示例站点地图数据的第五个代码示例。The sixth code example provides sample site map data for the fifth code example. - 第七个代码示例演示如何填充中的节点从客户端的控件。The seventh code example demonstrates how to populate the nodes in the control from the client. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下面的代码示例的帧。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/CS/framecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/VB/framevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法来显示中的静态数据控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use declarative syntax to display static data in the control. 此示例中前面的示例中的框架集用于显示内容的表。This example is used within the frame set of the preceding example to display a table of contents. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/CS/treeviewframecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/VB/treeviewframevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定到 XML 数据源的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the control to an XML data source. 此示例中正常工作，必须将复制此代码示例中，到名为 Book.xml 后提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/CS/treeviewxmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/VB/treeviewxmlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例为前面的示例提供示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding example. ```
``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用通过将其绑定到的站点导航控件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control for site navigation by binding it to a control. 此示例中正常工作，必须将复制此代码示例中，为一个名为 Web.sitemap 文件后提供的示例站点映射数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data, provided after this code example, to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/CS/treeviewautogeneratebindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/VB/treeviewautogeneratebindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例为前面的代码示例提供示例站点地图数据。The following code example provides sample site map data for the preceding code example. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何填充中的节点从客户端的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to populate the nodes in the control from the client. 启用客户端的节点填充后，会自动填充节点，在客户端，而无需回发到服务器上。When client-side node population is enabled, nodes are populated dynamically on the client, without the need to post back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否自动生成树节点绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control automatically generates tree node bindings.

span.span: to have the control automatically generate tree node bindings; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 树节点绑定定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。Tree node bindings define the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to. 绑定到其中的每个数据项都包含多个属性 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素） 的数据源时控件需要知道要向其绑定的数据项目属性属性。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), the control needs to know which data item property to bind to which property. 如果属性设置为`true`，则控件自动生成默认设置树节点绑定属性与绑定到的值相关联的对象返回的`ToString`的数据项的方法。If the property is set to `true`, the control automatically generates default tree node bindings that set the property of the object that is associated with the binding to the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item. > [!NOTE] > 不会自动生成的树节点绑定添加到集合。The automatically generated tree node bindings are not added to the collection. 在 XML 元素，返回的值的情况下`ToString`方法是显示基础结构的 XML 文件中，但除此之外并不非常有用的元素名称。In the case of an XML element, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method is the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the XML file, but is not very useful otherwise. 若要创建更有用的树，必须定义自己的树节点绑定通过填充集合。To create a more useful tree, you must define your own tree node bindings by populating the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果定义了集合，控件而不是自动生成的树节点绑定中使用这些值。If you define a collection, the control uses those values instead of automatically generated tree node bindings. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何通过设置来禁用自动生成树节点绑定属性设置为`false`。The first code example demonstrates how to disable automatic tree node binding generation by setting the property to `false`. 第二个代码示例提供示例站点地图数据的第一个代码示例。The second code example provides sample site map data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何通过设置来禁用自动生成树节点绑定属性设置为`false`。The following code example demonstrates how to disable automatic tree node binding generation by setting the property to `false`. 一个然后定义集合来建立此关系中的数据项之间控件和的节点控件。A collection is then defined to establish the relationship between the data items in a control and the nodes of the control. 此示例中正常工作，必须将复制此代码示例中，为一个名为 Web.sitemap 文件后提供的示例站点映射数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data, provided after this code example, to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/CS/treeviewautogeneratebindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/VB/treeviewautogeneratebindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供示例站点地图数据的前面的示例。The following code example provides sample site map data for the preceding example. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当复选框显示在控件 (通过设置属性的值以外的其他`TreeNodeType.None`)，使用属性来确定哪些节点显示所选的复选框。When check boxes are displayed in the control (by setting the property to a value other than `TreeNodeType.None`), use the property to determine which nodes display a selected check box. 此集合通常用于循环访问树中已选中的复选框的所有节点。This collection is commonly used to iterate through all the nodes that have a selected check box in the tree. 引发事件时的复选框控件更改状态的各次发送到服务器。The event is raised when the check boxes of the control change state between posts to the server. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，如更新数据库或显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 使用树状结构的深度优先遍历填充集合： 填充下一个父节点之前，处理每个父节点及其子节点下。The collection is populated using a depth-first traversal of the tree structure: each parent node is processed down to its child nodes before the next parent node is populated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定哪些节点已选中的复选框控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which nodes have a selected check box in the control. summary.span: 获取或设置自定义图像的 URL，该图像用作可折叠节点的指示符。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.

value.span: 为可折叠节点所显示的自定义图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to a custom image to display for collapsible nodes.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将显示默认的减号 (-) 图像。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which displays the default minus sign (-) image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定自定义映像的可折叠节点指示符。Use the property to specify a custom image for the collapsible node indicator. 此映像可折叠的节点旁边显示，通常是负号 （-）。This image is displayed next to a collapsible node and is usually a minus sign (-). 当属性设置为`true`，则控件将显示一个加号 （+） 或减号 （-） 或节点以指示节点是否是可扩展、 可折叠的还是非可展开分别旁边占位符图像。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or a minus sign(-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像属性设置为`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置， ，和属性设置为自定义映像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs for the custom images. 如果没有指定任何图像，则使用默认映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，请设置属性设置为`false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保节点中正确地对齐控件使用的自定义映像时，请确保由指定的所有映像， ，和属性具有相同的尺寸。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 在自定义映像用作可折叠节点指示符时，还应考虑设置属性来指定图像的工具提示。When using a custom image for the collapsible node indicator, you should also consider setting the property to specify a ToolTip for the image. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定自定义映像的可折叠节点指示符。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the collapsible node indicator. 对于代码示例来显示和要在控件中显示的图像中，您必须提供你自己的映像并属性必须设置为`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewCustomImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCustomImage/CS/treeviewcustomimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewCustomImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCustomImage/VB/treeviewcustomimagevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象定义数据项与其绑定到的节点之间的关系。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.

value.span: 表示数据项与其绑定到的节点之间关系的一个 。

span.span: A that represents the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 集合包含对象以定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 当绑定到数据源，其中每个数据项都包含多个属性 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素） 节点显示返回的值`ToString`数据项，默认情况下的方法。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 对于 XML 元素，该节点显示显示基础结构的树中，但除此之外并不非常有用的元素名称。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 可以通过指定树节点绑定来绑定到特定数据项属性节点。You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings. 在定义数据项和节点之间的关系时，必须指定要绑定到的属性的绑定和值为这两个条件对象。When defining the relationship between a data item and a node, you must specify both the criteria for binding and the values to bind to the properties of object. 该条件指示应在何时数据项绑定到的节点。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a node. 可以使用节点深度、 数据成员，或同时指定条件。The criteria can be specified with a node depth, a data member, or both. 节点深度指定获取绑定的节点级别。A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound. 例如，如果指定的节点深度为 0，在级别 0 的树状结构中的所有节点都使用都绑定树节点绑定。For example, if you specify a node depth of 0, all nodes in the tree structure at level 0 are bound using the tree node binding. 数据成员在基础数据源中，可以指定数据项的类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 例如，一个 XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 如果多个对象定义相互冲突的控件应用树节点绑定的优先顺序如下：If multiple objects are defined that conflict with each other, the control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines both a depth and a data member. 2. 只定义深度的对象。The object that defines only the depth. 3. 只定义数据成员的对象。The object that defines only the data member. 4. 定义深度既不数据成员的对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. 如果多个绑定指定了符合相同的优先级条件，则应用集合中的第一个绑定。If multiple bindings are specified that meet the same precedence criteria, the first binding in the collection is applied. 建立绑定条件后，就可以绑定的属性可以绑定到值的对象。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 你可以将绑定到某个属性或字段的数据项目，或显示静态值。You can either bind to an attribute or field of a data item or display a static value. 有关绑定的属性的详细信息对象复制到一个值，请参阅。For more information on binding the properties of a object to a value, see . 尽管可以以编程方式填充集合，但它通常以声明方式设置。Although the collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively. 若要指定树节点绑定，请首先打开和关闭``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify the tree node bindings, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来，将放置``元素的开始和结束之间``标记每个树节点绑定您想要指定。Next, place `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags for each tree node binding you want to specify. 通过设置创建数据绑定是的属性控制对`true`，创建绑定都属性设置为`true`。When data bindings are created by setting the property of the control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the property set to `true`. 以声明方式创建的数据绑定属性设置为`false`。Data bindings that are created declaratively have the property set to `false`. 使用声明性语法可以控制各个数据绑定的行为。Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用集合来定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。The first code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 第二个代码示例在第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合来定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 此示例中正常工作，必须将复制此代码示例中，到名为 Book.xml 后提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. 此示例仅指定绑定的属性。This example specifies only the property of the binding. 无法通过还指定添加略微的性能增益属性。A slight performance gain could be added by also specifying the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/CS/treeviewxmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/VB/treeviewxmlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例为前面的示例提供示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding example. ```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性指定是否控件呈现兼容的浏览器以处理展开和折叠事件上的客户端脚本。Use the property to specify whether the control renders client-side script on compatible browsers to handle expanding and collapsing events. 当此属性设置为`true`，兼容的浏览器执行的代码以展开和折叠节点在客户端上。When this property is set to `true`, compatible browsers execute the code to expand and collapse nodes on the client. 必须为客户端脚本，以便用于提前已知的树节点数据。The tree node data must be known in advance for the client-side script to work. 使用客户端脚本可防止 post 回服务器每次一个节点是展开还是折叠。Using client script prevents a post back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed. 节点时事先不知道的树节点数据，可以从客户端，如果填充`PopulateNodesFromClient`属性也设置为`true`。When the tree node data is not known in advance, nodes can be populated from the client, if the `PopulateNodesFromClient` property is also set to `true`. 在此方案中，您还必须提供的事件处理方法事件以填充节点。In this scenario, you must also provide an event-handling method for the event to populate the nodes. 客户端的节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为`false`，则控件回发到服务器每次一个节点是展开还是折叠。If the property is set to `false`, the control posts back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性呈现用于展开和折叠节点在兼容浏览器上的客户端脚本。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to render client-side script that is used to expand and collapse nodes on compatible browsers. 第二个代码示例在第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性呈现用于展开和折叠节点在兼容浏览器上的客户端脚本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to render client-side script that is used to expand and collapse nodes on compatible browsers. 请注意，需要向服务器发送可展开和折叠节点时属性设置为`false`。Notice that a post to the server is required to expand and collapse a node when the property is set to `false`. 此示例中正常工作，必须将复制此代码示例中，到名为 Book.xml 后提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewEnableClientScript#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewEnableClientScript/CS/treeviewenableclientscriptcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewEnableClientScript#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewEnableClientScript/VB/treeviewenableclientscriptvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例为前面的代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定自定义映像的可展开节点指示符。Use the property to specify a custom image for the expandable node indicator. 此映像可展开的节点旁边显示，通常是加号 （+）。This image is displayed next to an expandable node and is usually a plus sign (+). 当属性设置为`true`，则控件将显示一个加号 （+） 或减号 （-） 或节点以指示节点是否是可扩展、 可折叠的还是非可展开分别旁边占位符图像。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像属性设置为`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置， ，和属性设置为自定义映像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs for the custom images. 如果没有指定任何图像，则使用默认映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，请设置属性设置为`false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保节点中正确地对齐控件使用的自定义映像时，请确保由指定的所有映像， ，和属性具有相同的尺寸。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 若要正确显示自定义映像，您可能需要设置到`false`。To display a custom image correctly, you may need to set to `false`. 在自定义映像用作可展开节点指示符时，还应考虑设置属性来指定图像的工具提示。When using a custom image for the expandable node indicator, you should also consider setting the property to specify a ToolTip for the image. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定自定义映像的可展开节点指示符。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the expandable node indicator. 对于代码示例来显示和要在控件中显示的图像中，您必须提供你自己的映像并属性必须设置为`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是属性的对象 (例如， `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 仅在支持脚本的客户端上支持此功能。This feature is supported only on script-capable clients. > [!NOTE] > 若要使用属性，必须包含``具有元素`runat="server"`属性。To use the property, you must include a `` element with a `runat="server"` attribute. 常用设置通常包括自定义背景色、 前景色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 按以下顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义的集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. > [!NOTE] > 样式设置属性重写中的任何相应节点样式设置， ， ， ，或属性。The style settings for the property override any corresponding node style settings that are in the , , , , or property. 属性不呈现的节点及其属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The property is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 与不同并的属性对象，属性是对象。Unlike the and the properties, which are objects, the property is a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制节点的外观，当鼠标指针悬停。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 对于此示例正常工作，必须包括``具有元素`runat="server"`属性。For this example to work, you must include a `` element with a `runat="server"` attribute. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的一组图像用于控件。Use the property to specify the group of images to use for the control. 您可以选择一组预定义的映像要提供的标准外观的控件或定义你自己的自定义组。You can either select a predefined set of images to give the control a standard look or define your own custom set. > [!NOTE] > 属性不会影响节点的任何样式设置。The property does not affect any style settings for a node. 设置适当的样式属性，如属性，如果你想要添加自定义颜色和间距。Set the appropriate style property, such as the property, if you want to add custom colors and spacing. 下表列出了有效的值为属性。The following table lists the valid values for The property. |图像集Image set|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeViewImageSet.Arrows`|使用箭头图像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses arrow images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList`|使用菱形项目符号图像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses diamond-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList2`|使用方形项目符号图像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses square-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList3`|预定义的、分节的菱形项目符号图像集。A predefined set of sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList4`|预定义的、大小随级别不同而变化的、分节的备用菱形项目符号图像集。A predefined set of alternate sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images in sizes that vary by level.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Contacts`|使用 MSN Messenger 映像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses MSN Messenger images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`|用户定义的图像集。A user-defined image set.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Events`|使用事件日志样式的图像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses event log-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Faq`|使用 FAQ 样式的图像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses FAQ-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Inbox`|使用电子邮件样式的图像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses email-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.News`|使用新闻组样式的图像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses newsgroup-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple`|使用简单形状轮廓的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses simple shape outlines.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple2`|使用简单实心的形状的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses simple filled shapes.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Msdn`|使用 MSDN 映像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses MSDN images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.WindowsHelp`|使用 Microsoft Windows 帮助映像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses Microsoft Windows Help images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.XPFileExplorer`|使用 Microsoft Windows XP 中可用的 Windows 资源管理器中映像的预定义的映像组。A predefined image set that uses Windows Explorer images available in Microsoft Windows XP.| 时定义自定义映像，应为每个以下表中的属性来指定图像。When defining a custom set of images, you should indicator.| ||指向包含连接节点的行的自定义映像的文件夹的 URL。The URL to a folder that contains custom images for the lines that connect nodes.| ||非可展开节点指示符的自定义图像 URL。The URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的叶节点的外观控件。Use the property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是属性的对象 (例如， `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义背景色、 前景色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 按以下优先级顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义的集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. 如果您需要生成表的内容 – 样式导航菜单，其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子节点，则可以考虑使用而不是设置单个属性样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的叶节点的外观控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用作为单独的样式属性的替代方法的集合 (如属性) 来控制树中各个级别上的节点的样式。Use the collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as the property) to control the style of nodes at the individual levels of the tree. 集合中的第一个样式对应于树的第一个级别中的节点的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the first level of the tree. 集合中的第二个样式对应于树中，依次类推的第二个级别中的节点的样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the second level of the tree, and so on. 此属性通常用于确定生成表的内容 – 样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子节点。This property is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes. 按以下顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义的集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性创建导航菜单。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a navigation menu. 控件始终是完全展开，展开节点指示符和隐藏的图像。The control is always fully expanded, with the expansion node indicators and images hidden. 此外，属性用于控制节点级别的间距。Also, the property is used to control the spacing of the node levels. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示连接到父节点的子节点的行时属性设置为`true`。The control can display lines that connect child nodes to parent nodes when the property is set to `true`. 当显示行时，使用属性以指定包含要使用的线条的预呈现图像集的 Web 访问文件夹。When lines are displayed, use the property to specify a Web-accessible folder that contains the set of pre-rendered images to use for the lines. 下表描述了使用的映像控件。The following table describes the images that are used by the control. |图像Image|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |Dash.gifDash.gif|当没有树状结构中的只有一个根节点和根节点的根节点旁边显示的线条图像是叶节点。A line image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure and the root node is a leaf.| |Dashminus.gifDashminus.gif|减号 （-） 以指示已展开的根节点的树状结构中只有一个根节点时，根节点旁显示的图像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is expanded.| |Dashplus.gifDashplus.gif|以指示已折叠的根节点的树状结构中只有一个根节点时显示的根节点旁边的加号 （+） 图像。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is collapsed.| |I.gifI.gif|显示连接相邻的节点的线条图像。A line image displayed to connect adjacent nodes.| |L.gifL.gif|显示的线条图像接下来的最后一个节点在分支中一个叶节点时。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch when the node is a leaf.| |Lminus.gifLminus.gif|显示的线条图像接下来的最后一个节点以指示该节点展开分支中。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Lplus.gifLplus.gif|显示的线条图像接下来的最后一个节点中的分支，以指示节点处于折叠状态。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is collapsed.| |Minus.gifMinus.gif|已展开显示包含多个根节点，以指示节点的树状结构中的第一个根节点旁边的减号 （-） 图像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded. 此映像不包含额外的行，并仅一次折叠的根节点后显示。This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been collapsed once. 在首次加载页面时显示 Rminus.gif 图像。When the page is first loaded, the Rminus.gif image is displayed.| |Noexpand.gifNoexpand.gif|叶节点旁显示的空白分隔条图像。A blank spacer image displayed next to a leaf node. 此映像允许文本垂直排列。This image allows text to line up vertically.| |Plus.gifPlus.gif|显示包含多个根节点，以指示节点的树状结构中的第一个根节点旁边的加号 （+） 图像处于折叠状态。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed. 此映像不包含额外的行和根节点扩展一次后才显示。This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been expanded once. 在首次加载页面时显示 Rplus.gif 图像。When the page is first loaded, the Rplus.gif image is displayed.| |R.gifR.gif|包含多个根节点，以指示该节点是一个叶节点的树状结构中的第一个根节点旁边显示的线条图像。A line image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is a leaf node.| |Rminus.gifRminus.gif|已展开显示包含多个根节点，以指示节点的树状结构中的第一个根节点旁边的减号 （-） 图像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded. 此映像包含额外的行，仅当首次加载页面时显示。This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded. 在根之后显示 Minus.gif 映像后，已折叠节点。After the root node has been collapsed once, The Minus.gif image is displayed.| |Rplus.gifRplus.gif|显示包含多个根节点，以指示节点的树状结构中的第一个根节点旁边的加号 （+） 图像处于折叠状态。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed. 此映像包含额外的行，仅当首次加载页面时显示。This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded. 在根之后显示 Plus.gif 映像后，已扩展节点。After the root node has been expanded once, the Plus.gif image is displayed.| |T.gifT.gif|显示中间 （在 t 交集） 的树状结构的节点旁边以指示该节点是一个叶的线条图像。A line image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is a leaf.| |Tminus.gifTminus.gif|减号 （-） 图像 （在 t 交集） 的树状结构的中间节点旁边显示，以指示该节点已展开。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Tplus.gifTplus.gif|显示中间 （在 t 交集） 的树状结构的节点旁边以指示节点处于折叠状态的加号 （+） 图像。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置属性，控件将使用内置的默认图像 （20 x 20 像素为单位）。If the property is not set, the control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels). 某些可视化设计器，如 Microsoft Visual Studio 提供工具来生成的线条图像。Some visual designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, provide tools to generate the line images. 运行的时不能翻转从右到左显示的自定义映像。The run time does not flip custom images for right-to-left displays. 若要支持从左到右和从右到左的网页，必须创建两个方向上的图像集。To support both left-to-right and right-to-left Web pages, you must create image sets for both directions. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在中显示的线条图像所属文件夹控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the folder that contains the line images to display in the control. 若要使用此示例中，使用行设计器工具预先创建一组行图像。To work with this example, use the Line Designer tool beforehand to create a set of line images. 将它们放在名为目录中的示例应用程序 remarks.format:
## Remarks 绑定时控件与数据源，使用属性可限制要绑定到控件的树级别数。When binding the control to a data source, use the property to limit the number of tree levels to bind to the control. 例如，此属性设置为`2`绑定只有根节点和到的根节点下的任何节点控件。For example, setting this property to `2` binds only the root node and any nodes that are immediately under the root node to the control. 数据源中的所有剩余节点将被忽略。All remaining nodes in the data source are ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 恶意用户可以创建一个回调请求并获取数据的节点页面开发人员不显示控件。A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the control that the page developer is not displaying. 因此，必须由数据源实现数据的安全性。Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source. 不要使用属性隐藏数据。Do not use the property to hide data. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性将仅前两个节点级别 （深度 0 和 1） 绑定到控件。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the control. 第二个代码示例在第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将仅前两个节点级别 （深度 0 和 1） 绑定到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the control. 数据源中的所有节点级别将被都忽略。All node levels in the data source are ignored. 此示例中正常工作，必须将复制此代码示例中，到名为 Book.xml 后提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取对象，其中包含在树中的所有根节点。Use the property to get a object that contains all the root nodes in the tree. 若要快速循环访问所有根节点，或访问树中的特定根节点通常使用此集合。This collection is commonly used to quickly iterate through all the root nodes, or to access a specific root node in the tree. > [!NOTE] > 典型的树结构只包含一个根节点;但是，可以添加到多个根节点控件。A typical tree structure has only one root node; however, you can add multiple root nodes to the control. 还可以使用属性来以编程方式管理在树的根节点。The property can also be used to manage the root nodes in the tree programmatically. 可以添加、 插入、 删除和检索集合中的对象。You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve objects from the collection. 对集合的任何更新会自动反映在往返到服务器下一步后的控件。Any updates to the collection are automatically reflected in the control after the next round trip to the server. 若要访问根节点的子节点，请使用节点的属性。To access the child nodes of a root node, use the property of the node. 使用的每个后续的父级别节点，节点级别下导航属性。Use the property of each subsequent parent-level node to navigate down the node levels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性遍历树。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to traverse the tree. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定自定义映像的非可展开节点指示符。Use the property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator. 非可展开节点指示符映像 （或垫片） 旁边将显示叶节点 （代替可展开和折叠节点指示符） 对齐具有父或根节点的叶节点。The non-expandable node indicator image (or spacer) is displayed next to leaf nodes (in place of the expandable and collapsible node indicators) to align the leaf nodes with parent or root nodes. 当属性设置为`true`，则控件将显示一个加号 （+） 或减号 （-） 或节点以指示节点是否是可扩展、 可折叠的还是非可展开分别旁边占位符图像。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像属性设置为`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置， ，和属性设置为自定义映像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs of the custom images. 如果没有指定任何图像，则使用默认映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，请设置属性设置为`false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保节点中正确地对齐控件使用的自定义映像时，请确保由指定的所有映像， ，和属性具有相同的尺寸。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定自定义映像的非可展开节点指示符。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator. 对于代码示例来显示和要在控件中显示的图像中，您必须提供你自己的映像并属性必须设置为`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，它并不可行静态预定义的树结构，由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 正因为如此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的属性设置为`true`，在运行时节点展开时，会填充该节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充节点，请首先设置到的节点属性`true`。To populate a node dynamically, first set the property for the node to `true`. 接下来，定义的事件处理方法以编程方式填充节点的事件。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that programmatically populates the node. 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到的节点结构，以及然后将添加到的节点结构填充节点的集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 通过添加创建的节点结构对象添加到父节点的集合。A node structure is created by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 当节点的属性设置为`true`，必须动态填充节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 不能以声明方式嵌套; 其下方的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. 支持的浏览器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 兼容浏览器及更高版本) 还可以充分利用客户端的节点填充。Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population. 如果启用，这将允许控件来动态填充客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node on the client dynamically when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 客户端的节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的父节点的外观控件。Use the property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是属性的对象 (例如， `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义背景色、 前景色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 按以下优先级顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义的集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. 如果您需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单，其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子节点，则可以考虑使用而不是设置单个属性样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的父节点的外观控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，它并不可行静态预定义的树结构，由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 正因为如此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的属性设置为`true`，在运行时节点展开时，会填充该节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 除了填充时按需节点，则可以填充直接在支持的客户端浏览器上的节点。In addition to populating nodes on demand, it is possible to populate the nodes directly on a supported client browser. 当属性设置为`true`，从客户端填充树节点中，而不需要回发到服务器调用服务。When the property is set to `true`, a service is called from the client to populate the tree nodes, which eliminates the need to post back to the server. 否则为控件回发到服务器以填充节点。Otherwise, the control posts back to the server to populate the nodes. > [!NOTE] > 属性也必须设置为`true`以便属性设置为`true`。The property must also be set to `true` in order for the property to be set to `true`. 若要填充的节点上的客户端，请首先设置属性设置为`true`，然后设置到的节点属性`true`。To populate a node on the client, first set the property to `true` and then set the property for the node to `true`. 接下来，定义的事件处理方法以编程方式填充节点的事件。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that programmatically populates the node. 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到的节点结构，以及然后将添加到的节点结构填充节点的集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 可通过添加创建的节点结构对象添加到父节点的集合。You create a node structure by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 当节点的属性设置为`true`，必须动态填充节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 不能以声明方式嵌套; 其下方的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. > [!NOTE] > 在支持回调脚本的浏览器中支持客户端的节点填充功能。The client-side node population feature is supported in browsers that support callback scripts. 若要检查浏览器是否支持回调脚本访问，请使用属性的类。To check whether a browser supports callback scripts access, use the property of the class. 您可以访问的实例通过将当前请求的类属性的类。You can access the instance of the class for the current request through the property of the class. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来启用客户端中的节点填充控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable client-side population of the nodes in the control. 请注意，启用客户端的节点填充后，会自动填充节点在客户端，而无需回发到服务器上。Notice that when client-side node population is enabled, nodes are populated dynamically on the client, without the need to post back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的根节点的外观控件。Use the property to control the appearance of the root node in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是属性的对象 (例如， `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义背景色、 前景色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 按以下优先级顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义的集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 4. 。. 如果您需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单，其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子节点，则可以考虑使用而不是设置单个属性样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的根节点的外观控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the root node in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的节点的文本控件可以在两种模式之一中： 选择模式和导航模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode. 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要将节点放入导航模式，设置到不是空字符串值的节点的属性 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the property for the node to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置属性的节点为空字符串 ("")。To put a node into selection mode, set the property for the node to empty string (""). 节点在选择模式下时，用户可以选择通过单击该节点中的文本节点。When a node is in selection mode, the user can select a node by clicking on the text in the node. 使用属性来确定哪个节点中选择控件。Use the property to determine which node is selected in the control. > [!NOTE] > 不能为一个节点时选择控件显示的超链接。A node cannot be selected when the control displays hyperlinks. 当显示超链接时，属性始终返回`null`。When hyperlinks are displayed, the property always returns `null`. 当用户选择中的其他节点通过单击新的节点中的文本控件引发事件时，默认情况下。When the user selects a different node in the control by clicking the text in the new node, the event is raised, by default. 可以通过设置指定不同事件属性的属性。You can specify a different event by setting the property for the property. 下表列出了可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |选择操作Selection action|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||切换节点的展开和折叠状态。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 将引发或作为相应事件。Raises the or event, as appropriate.| ||在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 和 两个事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 不呈现的节点及其属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定的值中的选定节点控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the value of the selected node in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/CS/treeviewselectednodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/VB/treeviewselectednodestylevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Occurs when a node is selected in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中选择一个节点时引发事件控件。The event is raised when a node is selected in the control. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如，更新所显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. 可以选择性地设置节点指定时选择该节点时引发的事件的属性。You can optionally set the property for a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected. 下表列出了可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |选择操作Selection action|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||切换节点的展开和折叠状态。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 将引发或作为相应事件。Raises the or event, as appropriate.| ||在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 和 两个事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 不呈现的节点及其属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 返回在用户单击一个节点时，仅在触发事件。The event is fired only on post back when a user clicks a node. 如果不激发事件以编程方式更改属性。The event is not fired if the property is changed programmatically. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以更新控件中选择节点时控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update a control when a node is selected in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/CS/treeviewselectednodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/VB/treeviewselectednodestylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供在多节点选择支持控件，可以显示此图像可查看某个节点旁边的复选框。To provide multi-node selection support in the control, you can display check boxes next to the image for a node. 使用属性来指定哪些节点类型将显示一个复选框。Use the property to specify which node types will display a check box. 例如，如果此属性设置为`TreeNodeType.Parent`，复选框均显示在树中每个父节点。For example, if this property is set to `TreeNodeType.Parent`, check boxes are displayed for each parent node in the tree. 下表列出了此属性的有效值。The following table lists the valid values for this property. |节点类型Node type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeType.All`|为所有节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Leaf`|对于所有叶节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all leaf nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.None`|不显示复选框。Check boxes are not displayed.| |`TreeNodeType.Parent`|显示所有父节点的复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all parent nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Root`|为所有根节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all root nodes.| 用于枚举类型属性是标志枚举，以便您可以通过按位运算组合值。The enumeration type that is used for the property is a flag enumeration, which allows you to combine values through bitwise operations. 例如，若要显示的父节点和叶节点的复选框，请使用按位 OR 运算符合并`TreeNodeType.Parent`和`TreeNodeType.Leaf`值。For example, to display check boxes for the parent and leaf nodes, use the bitwise OR operator to combine the `TreeNodeType.Parent` and `TreeNodeType.Leaf` values. 若要确定哪些节点具有其复选框选择，循环访问的节点集合。To determine which nodes have their check box selected, iterate through the nodes of the collection. > [!NOTE] > 您可以重写设置的设置每个节点的属性。You can override the setting by setting the property for each node. 如果你需要提供仅单选支持，请考虑使用属性。If you need to provide only single-selection support, consider using the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示和隐藏的不同节点类型对应的复选框。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to show and hide the check boxes for the different node types. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewShowCheckBoxes/CS/treeviewshowcheckboxescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewShowCheckBoxes/VB/treeviewshowcheckboxesvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它用于为屏幕读取器呈现替换文字以跳过该控件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text for screen readers to skip the content for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串， 将其呈现为不可见图像的替换文字，作为对屏幕读取器的提示。

span.span: A string that the renders as alternate text with an invisible image as a hint to screen readers.

value.span: 默认为“跳过导航链接”。

span.span: The default is "Skip Navigation Links."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个属性，可以设置以使网页更多或更少可访问。The property is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible. 屏幕阅读器跳过从高声阅读的内容的用户的机制可以提供包含重复的内容的网页。Web pages that contain content that repeats can provide for a mechanism for users of screen readers to skip the content from being read aloud. 控件提供了作为整个控件由屏幕阅读器跳过一种方法的属性。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果属性设置，则呈现时不可见图像的替换文字，为用户提供选项以跳转到该控件的结尾。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control. 屏幕阅读器读取的替换文字，而图像占用只有一个像素的空间。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, while the image occupies only one pixel space. 对页面的呈现像素精确的控制，将设置属性为空字符串 ("")，并提供您自己的机制来跳过该树。For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the tree. 默认情况下，这使得屏幕阅读器跳过控件属性设置为空字符串。The property is set to the empty string by default, which makes screen readers not skip the control. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 在 控件中展开某个节点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a node is expanded in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中展开某个节点时将引发事件控件。The event is raised when a node is expanded in the control. 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行自定义的例程的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 如果节点的属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`或`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`，则中单击该节点时，也会引发事件控件。If the property for a node is set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand` or `TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`, the event is also raised when that node is clicked in the control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以更新的内容控制在用户展开中的节点控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update the content of a control when the user expands a node in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodeExpand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeExpand/CS/treeviewtreenodeexpandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodeExpand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeExpand/VB/treeviewtreenodeexpandvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TreeNodePopulate As TreeNodeEventHandler

summary.span: 当其 属性设置为 的节点在 控件中展开时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a node with its property set to is expanded in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，它并不可行静态预定义的树结构，由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 正因为如此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的属性设置为`true`，在运行时节点展开时，会填充该节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充节点，请首先设置到的节点属性`true`。To populate a node dynamically, first set the property for the node to `true`. 接下来，定义的事件处理方法以编程方式填充节点的事件。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that populates the node programmatically. 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到的节点结构，以及然后将添加到的节点结构填充节点的集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 通过添加创建的节点结构对象添加到父节点的集合。A node structure is created by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 当节点的属性设置为`true`，必须动态填充节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 不能以声明方式嵌套; 其下方的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. 支持的浏览器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 兼容浏览器及更高版本) 还可以充分利用客户端的节点填充。Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population. 如果启用，这将允许控件来填充客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 客户端的节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以填充中的节点动态在服务器上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to populate the nodes in the control dynamically on the server. 请注意，属性设置为`false`以防止在客户端上处理展开节点的事件。Notice that the property is set to `false` to prevent expanding-node events from being handled on the client. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodePopulate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodePopulate/CS/treeviewtreenodepopulatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodePopulate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodePopulate/VB/treeviewtreenodepopulatevb.aspx#1)]
